3211.message: GBABY and RyGUY. We need professional dancers at the wedding - you free??

ab n jojo.message: Abgail and Joseph! Charlie and Ike can come too, if they promise not to run up the bar tab. Will you join us?

ju n dan.message: Rev Ju and Dan! Get your shortie tuxes pressed - we need those runner's calves on display. Can ya make it?

maaam.message: Hi Maaam and Bob! Thanks for everything you've helped us with. We love you! Will you join us?

faja.message: Hi Dad and Julie! How about some delicious goat meat? We love you! Will you join us?

papnfox.message: Hi Pap and Fox! This is a formality - you coming to the wedding? Watch us get married and dance big.
buttons: Wouldn't miss it for the world.

fisk.message: Hallo Marv and Trav! Pleath come to our wedding! Love, Tammy and Rels.

lily.message: Hey Kate and Ian! Lily can come too, if she promises not to run up the bar tab. Will you join us?

lil sis is getting married.message: Hi Justin and Nichole! We love you! Will you join us?

amma.message: Hi Amma! How about a big city wedding adventure?! Will you join us?

go blue.message: Hi Grandma and Grandpa! We'd love to share our wedding day with you! Will you join us?

julie.message: Hi Julie! We'd love to share our wedding day with you! Will you join us?

tina.message: Hey guys! Can you help us finish our huppah real quick?

euchre.message: Hey guys! Maizey can come too, as long as she promises not to run up the bar tab. Will you join us?

goldfarb.message: Lizzie and Elmer! We can't celebrate without you, will you be there?

dragons.message: Marc. Come to our wedding, otherwise fuck you.

lyla.message: Hey Glotters! Will you two lead us in the Hora? Just kidding, that's cultural appropriation. Unless you say it's ok...

kevin smith.message: Hey Max and Corey! Will you join us for a night of naming random athletes? Maybe Schoolyard after?

eagle spot.message: Hey Dave and Katie! Feelin' a trip back to the midwest?

liseynjosh.message: Lisey and Josh! We can't celebrate without you, will you be there?

chchch.message: Hey Jake and Laura! C'mon and hang out a little, we have a little party planned...

bill murray.message: Hey Josh and Lauren! Feelin' a trip back to the midwest?

zeldas rents.message: Elexa and Kevin! We'd love to see you at our wedding! Can you make it?

braaap.message: Hey Uncle Tom! Louise keeps asking us if you'll come to our wedding, will you join us?

bruce.message: Hey Uncle Nitrous and Jordan! The farm will survive without you for a weekend, we'd love to see you at our wedding!

goblue.message: Hi Uncle Rob and Aunt Kathy! We'd love to see you at our wedding, will you join us?

mackinac island.message: Hi Uncle Joe and Shawna! We'd love to see you at our wedding, will you join us?

pineneedle lane.message: Hey Bruce and Cheryl! We'd love to see you at our wedding, will you join us?

cul de sac kids.message: Sam and Amaaaay! We'd love to see you at our wedding, will you join us?

patience and waiting.message: Yelloooo Joey and Molly! Hanson Island was open, but we decided to get married in Chicago... will you join us?
